dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5393 IH: Working Together to End Homelessness Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Royce of California (for himself, Ms. Maxine Waters of California, Mr. Stivers, and Mrs. Beatty) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To reauthorize the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Working Together to End Homelessness Act of 2018.

section.header: Reauthorization of United States Interagency Council on Homelessness

subsection.text: Title II of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11311 et seq.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating section 210 (42 U.S.C. 11320) as section 209.

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 101(b) of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11301 note) is amended by striking the items relating to sections 209 and 210 and inserting the following:
